## 在 css 伪类中使用 svg

首先把 svg 代码用 base64 编码加密

```svg
<svg t="1647690767562" class="icon" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2313" ><path d="M789.74509 0a57.904987 57.904987 0 1 0 57.904987 57.904987A57.904987 57.904987 0 0 0 789.74509 0z"  p-id="2314"></path><path d="M516.459795 731.604091a185.853685 185.853685 0 1 1 185.689648-185.689648A186.017722 186.017722 0 0 1 516.459795 731.604091z m0-289.524937a103.835289 103.835289 0 1 0 103.671252 103.835289A103.999326 103.999326 0 0 0 516.459795 442.899337z"  p-id="2315"></path><path d="M516.459795 1023.917654a478.167248 478.167248 0 1 1 0-956.170459 487.517345 487.517345 0 0 1 60.037466 3.772846 41.009198 41.009198 0 1 1-10.170281 82.018396 389.58738 389.58738 0 0 0-49.211038-3.116699 395.656741 395.656741 0 1 0 253.764917 91.860603 41.009198 41.009198 0 1 1 52.491773-62.826091 478.003211 478.003211 0 0 1-306.912837 844.461404z"  p-id="2316"></path><path d="M661.632356 586.923641a42.813603 42.813603 0 0 1-14.763312-2.788626 41.009198 41.009198 0 0 1-23.457261-52.983884l126.80044-330.042024a41.009198 41.009198 0 0 1 76.605182 29.526622L699.360818 560.677754a41.009198 41.009198 0 0 1-37.728462 26.245887z"  p-id="2317"></path></svg>
```

加密后获得：

```base64

```

css 伪类中使用

```css
.foo::before {
  content: url("");
}
```
